name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Phone Agency Phone System for CRMS

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension enables you to use the Agency Management System to open the Client Record in the Pure Agency Phone System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for AMS to Pure Agency Phone System
